name: 1945 Air Strike Classic
description:
This is a classic shoot em up arcade game based in 1945.

Your mission (if you choose to accept it):

- Dodge the bullet hell and incoming enemy Aircrafts
- Destroy the enemy boss aircrafts at each stage
- Collect power-ups to upgrade your weapons
- Use bombs to blow up all enemies at once in hopeless situations

Top down shoot em up controlled with your mouse only.
